original_text: The Spirit of the Lord had now gone away from Saul. The Lord sent an evil spirit to Saul. It gave Saul trouble and fear in his mind.
korean_text: 여호와의 영이 사울에게서 떠나고 여호와께서 부리시는 악령이 그를 번뇌하게 한지라

sentences.original_text: The Spirit of the Lord had now gone away from Saul.
The Lord sent an evil spirit to Saul.
It gave Saul trouble and fear in his mind.
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 사울의 마음에 고통과 두려움을 주었습니다.
